hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT conditionType as conditionType, count(*) as count FROM UserSessions WHERE (:version is NULL OR version = :version) GROUP BY conditionType
SELECT modelDiagnosis as modelDiagnosis, count(*) as count FROM UserSessions WHERE conditionType = :conditionType AND (:version is NULL OR :version = version) GROUP BY modelDiagnosis
SELECT conditionType as conditionType, count(*) as count FROM UserSessions GROUP BY conditionType
SELECT text as text FROM Jsonfiles WHERE name=:conditionType ORDER BY modifiedAt DESC

SELECT node.nodeId as nodeId, count(*) as count FROM UserSessions WHERE conditionType = :conditionType AND modelDiagnosis = :modelDiagnosis AND (:version is NULL OR :version = version) GROUP BY node.nodeId
SELECT version as version from UserSessions group by version
